name.ja: ＂<ruby>罪<rt>ざい</rt></ruby><ruby>宝<rt>ほう</rt></ruby><ruby>狩<rt>が</rt></ruby>りの<ruby>悪<rt>あく</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>＂

text.en: Add 1 "Diabellestarr" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your "Sinful Spoils" Spells/Traps that is banished or in your GY, except ""The Sinful Spoils Hunter Fiend""; place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of ""The Sinful Spoils Hunter Fiend"" once per turn.
